title: "Black Feeling" (funk/soul font)
author: windings

comments.content:
This looks a lot like Cooper Black Italic, though I've not seen these swash letters in either print or digital samples. May be custom work based on Cooper.

[Cooper Black Italic at You Work For Them](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200401/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/font/T3177/cooper-black-swash-italic?affid=143174)
Could be Cooper Black Italic distorted in photo type setting days

This seems half-way there: ITC/Linotype Candice  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/candice\_itc/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200401/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/candice_itc/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200401im_/http:/typophile.com/files/black1_4160.jpg)

Candice, an old Letraset font (with modifications):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/candice-lt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200401/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/candice-lt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/candice-lt/")

(other links removed)
Once again Candice is close but has to be added to and distorted
